issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: I am running an application to detect screen measurements, and my surprise was that the application running on an iPhone 6 iPhone 6 plus also detects measures iPhone 5 / 5S / 5C. Interestingly this application running on an iPad if it detects screen measures correctly.
fields.environment:
Mavericks 10.9.4
iOS SDK 8.0
XCode 6.0.1
SDK 3.4.0 RC
Studio 3.4.0 RC

comments.body:
Hello,

Please follow the guidelines to report a bug:

https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-SubmittingTickets

In your report you need to add:

* Description of the issue - In short what is happening.
* Steps to reproduce the issue - Instructions and code how to reproduce this, like: create a new mobile project, paste this code into app.js and run it in a device. Please keep your testcase minimal, this is, only add code in order to show the issue, and keep out things like style, color, etc.
We believe it may be because you are running in compatibility mode. You need to update your splash screens to include iPhone 6-specific ones.
We need some more information to diagnose this information. If you can provide us with the requested pieces, we'd be happy to reopen this ticket.
